faculties_accepted: College of Design and Engineering (CDE or FoE)
Yong Loo Lin School of Medicine (YLLSOM)
module_restrictions: Only students who are in Year 3 of their study when embarking for SEP can apply. Relevant academic background and specific subject field modules from NUS are required.
visa_info: Information about immigration-related issues will be sent by TU/e after acceptance. Additional information can be obtained from the Dutch embassy in Singapore.
accommodations_info: Information about student housing is available at: https://www.tue.nl/en/education/become-a-tue-student/housing/
cost_of_living: The cost of living and estimated expenses in Eindhoven can be found at: https://www.tue.nl/en/education/become-a-tue-student/tuition-fees-and-other-study-costs/
